settings.heading: Taste Matters
settings.subtext: Being Hong Kong's first and premier online food & beverage boutique, Taste Matters provides excellence and home delivery for a wide selection of daily basic groceries and ties it together with an affordable range of hand picked premium food & beverage. Imported from Germany and Western Europe. Delivered to your home!

settings.heading: Latest News
settings.subtext:
koffee radio - time to chill

We like to share this radio station and hope you will enjoy the music. http://www.koffee.com.au/

settings.heading: Information
settings.subtext:
Dear Customers, please take notice:

Under the law of Hong Kong, intoxicating liquor must not be sold or supplied to a minor in the course of business.

根據香港法律，不得在業務過程中，向未成年人售賣或供應令人醺醉的酒類 。
